newsitem.title: USA: Lord Abbett Bond sets monthly dividends.
newsitem.headline: Lord Abbett Bond sets monthly dividends.

text.p: Lord Abbett Bond Debenture class A, class B and class C common stock set monthly dividends for three months of $0.07, $0.064 and $0.064 per share, respectively.

The dividends, payable for three months for all three classes, to shareholders of record January 6, 1997, February 5, 1997 and March 6, 1997 have a payment date set for January 15 1997, Febraury 17, 1997 and March 17 1997, according to a company statement.
